videos.title: Python Tutorial 01 - Basic Introduction
what_you_will_learn: What Python is and why it's popular.
How to set up your Python environment.
The basic syntax of a Python script.
videos.content_covered: This video provides a gentle introduction to the Python programming language. It covers the history of Python, its key features, and walks you through writing and running your first 'Hello, World!' program. No prior programming experience is required.

videos.title: Python Tutorial 02 - Basic Operators
what_you_will_learn: How to use operators in expressions.
videos.content_covered: Learn the fundamental building blocks of Python logic. This tutorial explains how to perform mathematical calculations and compare values, which is essential for making decisions in your code.

videos.title: Python Tutorial 05 - Function with One Input
what_you_will_learn: How to define a function using `def`.
How to pass a single argument to a function.
The concept of reusable code blocks.
videos.content_covered: Functions are the core of organized programming. This video teaches you how to create a simple function that takes one piece of data, processes it, and prints a result.

videos.title: Python Tutorial 06 - Function Output
what_you_will_learn: Using the `return` statement to send data back from a function.
Capturing the returned value in a variable.
The difference between printing and returning.
videos.content_covered: Learn how to make your functions truly powerful by having them return values that can be used elsewhere in your program. This is a critical concept for building complex applications.

videos.title: Python Tutorial 07 - Function with Two Inputs
what_you_will_learn: Defining functions that accept multiple arguments.
Performing operations with two or more inputs.
videos.content_covered: Expand your knowledge of functions by learning how to work with multiple input parameters. This video demonstrates creating a function to add two numbers, a common and practical example.
